name: Good Hoody
description: Only 10 per color made available each season. The Good Hoody is back for a limited pre-sale with new colors on deck. Get your orders in now and expect a shipment date within two weeks or purchase! Garments are unisex and produced in 50% polyester/50% cotton fleece. Each style will have white drawstrings and center front zipper tape with The Good Child black & white woven logo patch. Made in the USA. Tweet

name: Stay Good
description: Run of 24. Stay Good is part of The Good Child motto, "Stay Good & be humble." This graphic was hand drawn in homage to the legendary Z-Boys of California and one of today's leading skateboarding brands, Toy Machine. In honor of the summer season, this shirt is made of a super fine and light jersey cotton. Breezy. All t-shirts are produced 100% in the USA on 100% fine jersey cotton - constructed at American Apparel in Los Angeles and screen printed in the Dallas/Fort Worth metroplex. Tweet

name: Hometown G
description: Run of 24. Originally printed for and sold at a Dallas event called Hometown Glory which featured a slew of local artists coming together to show the city how they work together - these soft-as-hell raglans are now available to ALL of you. This design features the Dallas skyline atop the beloved Good Child logo. "Hometown G" is printed on the back. All t-shirts are produced 100% in the USA on 100% fine jersey cotton - constructed at American Apparel in Los Angeles and screen printed in the Dallas/Fort Worth metroplex. Tweet

name: Good Polo (slate)
description: Exclusively limited. Simple, clean, appropriate for that first impression or a day in the office. Meet The Good Child Polo. Every polo comes with The Good Child patch sewn onto the left chest and a custom label in the neck seam. All polos are produced 100% in the USA on 100% combed cotton - constructed at American Apparel in Los Angeles and sewn out in the Dallas/Fort Worth metroplex.

name: Good Polo (peach)
description: Exclusively limited. Simple, clean, appropriate for that first impression or a day in the office. Meet The Good Child Polo. Every polo comes with The Good Child patch sewn onto the left chest and a custom label in the neck seam. All polos are produced 100% in the USA on 100% combed cotton - constructed at American Apparel in Los Angeles and sewn out in the Dallas/Fort Worth metroplex.

name: KH Art House x The Good Child: The Locals
description: Limited run of 60 (10 here, 50 there)! Kill Hubris Art House presents their 1st exclusive shirt! The Locals design represents some of North Texas' creative force. All portraits and lettering are hand drawn. Made of 94% ring spun cotton/6% organic ring spun cotton. This shirt is produced in Honduras, designed by yours truly, and screen printed in the Dallas/Fort Worth metroplex.

name: Not Much Competition
description: Run of 30. Growing up, I was called The Good Child. By now, you probably know that. What you don't know is that when my father would elaborate on why I was so Good, he would tag on this line... "Although, you don't have much competition..." Nowadays, my take on this line is I don't have much competition, because I am building a brand so personal that it could never be sold, etc. Either way, I love this/his tagline and I hope you sport it positively! All t-shirts are produced 100% in the USA on 100% fine jersey cotton - constructed at American Apparel in Los Angeles and screen printed in the Dallas/Fort Worth metroplex. Tweet

name: Good Thoughts
description: Run of 30. Vintage and The Good Child - on my mind 24/7. It's on their minds, too. Look how lovely everything is with a little Good in your life. All t-shirts are produced 100% in the USA on 100% fine jersey cotton - constructed at American Apparel in Los Angeles and screen printed in the Dallas/Fort Worth metroplex. Tweet

name: Goody Two Shoes (JORDANS)
description: Run of 25. Goody Two Shoes has multiple meanings; I am a goody two shoes (well, most of the time) and I also have love for sneakers. Both options for this t-shirt come on 100% fine jersey cotton made by American Apparel in the USA. The artwork was printed right here in the DFW – just like all of The Good Child styles. Stay fresh AND guilt-free! These styles will be available first at Sneaks Up and any remaining inventory will go online April 19th. REMEMBER: no style is ever produced again outside of the original run – and these two runs will have only TWENTY-FIVE each! Tweet

name: Goody Two Shoes (VANS)
description: Run of 25. Goody Two Shoes has multiple meanings; I am a goody two shoes (well, most of the time) and I also have love for sneakers. Personally, I prefer the classic Vans - especially during the summer. However, I know a lot of sneakerheads dig the Jordan III's, so have at it! Both options for this t-shirt come on 100% fine jersey cotton made by American Apparel in the USA. The artwork was printed right here in the DFW – just like all of The Good Child styles. Stay fresh AND guilt-free! These styles will be available first at Sneaks Up and any remaining inventory will go online April 19th. REMEMBER: no style is ever produced again outside of the original run – and these two runs will have only TWENTY-FIVE each! Tweet

name: The Good Child x GoodWoodNYC Black
description: Run of 15. Introducing, The Good Child x GoodWoodNYC "Black on Black on Black" pendant available exclusively this 2011 Black Friday weekend. SPECS 30" beaded, black wood necklace Natural wood 2.5" pendant, engraving double-sided Available for pre-order 11.25.11 through 11.28.11 only with guaranteed shipping within two weeks. Tweet My Great Web page

name: The Good Child x GoodWoodNYC Blood Wood - SOLD OUT
description: Run of 25. Introducing, The Good Child x GoodWoodNYC pendant in natural wood with a blood wood inlay. This beauty has incredible detail and hand-crafted work put in to the blood wood inlay. SPECS 30" beaded, light wood necklace Natural wood with blood wood inlay 2.5" pendant, engraving double-sided Available for pre-order only with guaranteed shipping within two weeks. Also available at Centre in Dallas, TX. Tweet

options.name: Natural blood wood inlay w/natural 30" chain

name: The Good Child Exclusive GoodWoodNYC - SOLD OUT
description: SPECS 30" beaded, light wood necklace Natural wood 2.5" pendant, engraving double-sided Introducing the official The Good Child necklace - designed by yours truly and constructed by the original GoodWoodNYC team. GoodWoodNYC is a female-led brand out of Brooklyn, NY. They specialize in natural wood products like necklaces, bracelets, earrings, keychains - you name it! They even make limited edition t-shirts! GoodWood has collaborated with designers such as Crooks & Castles, M. Tony Peralta, and Coat Of Arms NYC. Their product is also worn by artists Nas, Talib Kweli, Mos Def, and many more. All of this being said, I am thoroughly excited to introduce the GoodWoodNYC piece as the first accessory of The Good Child brand. This item is available for pre-order only. Place your order now or before 22.JAN.11 to secure your exclusive, limited edition GCGW necklace! Orders will be processed and shipped by 31.JAN.11. Tweet

name: Good Buttons - SOLD OUT
description: 1" buttons Designed by The Good Child Produced by Black Sheep Limited Available in singles One blind pin free with apparel/GoodWoodNYC purchase BUY 3, GET ONE FREE

name: Good Knockout - SOLD OUT
description: Run of 30. LAST SIZE SALE! Good Knockout - a play on brass knuckles and the brand name together. This is the most minimal style in The Good Child line...and one of my absolute favorites. All t-shirts are produced 100% in the USA on 100% fine jersey cotton - constructed at American Apparel in Los Angeles and screen printed in the Dallas/Fort Worth metroplex. Tweet

name: Good Travels - SOLD OUT
description: Run of 30. LAST SIZE SALE! I practically grew up in the Coachman winnebago you see pictured here (actual photo of it). My family and I traveled across the United States in this beast - camping, swimming on beaches, hiking, panning for gold, visiting ghost towns - you name it and we experienced it all by the hand of the Coachman. Have many adventures yourself this summer and stay fresh in this easy tank! All t-shirts are produced 100% in the USA on 100% fine jersey cotton - constructed at American Apparel in Los Angeles and screen printed in the Dallas/Fort Worth metroplex. Tweet

name: Better Music than Beaches - SOLD OUT
description: Run of 25. LAST SIZE SALE! *Tee is actually printed on a v-neck, see image 3 We all know the gulf is dirty - no harm in admitting to that - but, there is something to show off in Texas and that’s the music scene. With events like SXSW, Austin City Limits, and 35 Conferette, Texas cities are on the map for travel destinations. The ”DTX • ATX • SATX • HTX” in the graphic symbolizes each major city in Texas, north to south, that host some of the big music events. This tee is surf-inspired; the t-shirt body color comes only in khaki with the graphic ink colors inspired by Miami Vice, Grand Theft Auto, and found vintage t-shirts around Austin, TX. No one tee is alike. This t-shirt is produced on 40's 100% cotton jersey - knitted by Alternative Apparel and screen printed in the Dallas/Fort Worth metroplex. Tweet

name: Good Ride - SOLD OUT
description: Run of 25. This special t-shirt was made for the We Are 1976 event. Here you have The Good Child riding a tricycle down the sidewalk. The sidewalk reads through the decades (1976…1986…etc.). I chose to represent 1976 - the year Vynsie and Jully of We Are 1976 were born as well as 1986 - the year I was born (the official birth date of THE Good Child) to symbolize the unity between our brands at this point in history. And by "unity," I mean the incredible levels of support, laughter, and good times we share with one another! It felt good to design this exclusive t-shirt and it will feel even better on your back! All t-shirts are produced 100% in the USA on 100% fine jersey cotton - knitted at American Apparel in Los Angeles and screen printed in the Dallas/Fort Worth metroplex. Tweet

name: Good Dallas - SOLD OUT
description: Run of 30. "X" marks the spot and Dallas is where it's happening! This shirt fully embodies Dallas with the skyline, The Good Child, and of course - that beautiful green! Dallas, TX might have a lot of suburban sprawl and downtown businesses, but it is also super covered in beautiful greenery in the spring time. Not to mention - the Dallas Mavericks also sport a beautiful shade of green! Dallas is constantly putting itself on the map with arts, sports, and business. Represent this city the right way with this style! All t-shirts are produced 100% in the USA on 100% fine jersey cotton - constructed at American Apparel in Los Angeles and screen printed in the Dallas/Fort Worth metroplex. Tweet

name: A Child Called Good - SOLD OUT
description: Run of 30. At age 9, I listened to some hardcore rap (no joke). As I grew up, not only did I reach out to a vast variety of music styles, but I also broadened my liking of rap to include hip-hop, underground hip-hop, scratching and more. By my late teens, I was listening to a lot of Nas, Jay-Z, and A Tribe Called Quest. A Tribe Called Quest really spoke out to me; I had never heard intelligent hip-hop like that before. My favorite album is The Anthology - it's the easiest way to grasp everything they've got to say. Someone once asked me if that was my favorite ATCQ album and "are you sure?" YES, I am 100% sure and I'll rock this tribute t-shirt in 100% cotton for life! All t-shirts are produced 100% in the USA on 100% fine jersey cotton - knitted at American Apparel in Los Angeles and screen printed in the Dallas/Fort Worth metroplex. Tweet

name: Good Dunny - SOLD OUT
description: Run of 30. I have always been called The Good Child, (even when not-so-good), but I have had other nicknames, too. One of my long lasting nicknames is Heather Rabbit (people would mistake my last name, Abbott, for Rabbit when pronounced together with my first name). As I grew up, I became a big fan of vinyl toys - Kid Robot's Dunny being one of them. I figured it only right to make a tribute to both of these facts...Introducing The Good Child: Good Dunny. The color choice for this style was highly influenced by Kid Robot's use of rich, solid colors in their product. The afro-ears and back logo are in silver metallic ink. Enjoy! All t-shirts are produced 100% in the USA on 100% fine jersey cotton - knitted at American Apparel in Los Angeles and screen printed in the Dallas/Fort Worth metroplex. Tweet

name: Respect - SOLD OUT
description: Run of 30. This t-shirt is all about respect. In the image on the chest is my grandfather and my older brother having a drink and a laugh together. My grandfather used to build us stuff all the time - tree houses, play houses, doll houses… I always thought of my grandfather as one of the coolest cats in America. This 100% cotton, 100% American t-shirt is a tribute to him. All t-shirts are produced 100% in the USA on 100% fine jersey cotton - knitted at American Apparel in Los Angeles and screen printed in the Dallas/Fort Worth metroplex. Tweet

name: Good Gold - SOLD OUT
description: Run of 30. The original The Good Child logo blasted full-chest in gold metallic ink on 100% black cotton. When the first The Good Child t-shirt was released, I instantly thought, Man! That would look fresh in gold on a dark background! So, here you have it - THE best looking the logo has looked so far! All t-shirts are produced 100% in the USA on 100% fine jersey cotton - knitted at American Apparel in Los Angeles and screen printed in the Dallas/Fort Worth metroplex. Tweet

name: Good Logo - SOLD OUT
description: MEGA EXCLUSIVE run of 25 The official first The Good Child t-shirt with the full logo. All t-shirts are produced 100% in the USA on 100% fine jersey cotton - knitted at American Apparel in Los Angeles and screen printed in the Dallas/Fort Worth metroplex. Tweet

name: The Good Sticker - SOLD OUT
description: The BIGGER and BETTER stickers are here! 3x3" and waterproof! • Grab these, only 3 for $1 • Stick them to your computer, your car, street signs, leave them in shops, share them with friends, or secretly collect them for yourself! Tweet
